verbose_text: XREF_FIG (D) and XREF_FIG (E) show that blockade of PI3K (phosphoinositide 3-kinase)/Akt/mTOR activity by LY294002 or rapamycin treatment prevented the GDF15 mediated increase in the I K density and the increase in Kv2.1 protein expression.
evidence: PI3K (phosphoinositide 3-kinase)/Akt/mTOR activity by LY294002 or rapamycin treatment prevented the GDF15
